abstract: Stocks drop amid technology and health care share losses.

headline.print_headline: Health and Tech Shares Lead a Down Day for the Market
headline.main: Health and Tech Shares Lead a Down Day for the Market

snippet: The price of oil turned higher, helping lift energy stocks. Shares of Elizabeth Arden soared after Revlon said it would buy the company.
lead_paragraph: The price of oil turned higher, helping lift energy stocks. Shares of Elizabeth Arden soared after Revlon said it would buy the company.
